name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: (just one more relic and I’ll have all I need...)

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Oh, [color=#FF0000][i]WARRIOR,[/i][/color] your strength shows once again. Welcome to the Ice Realm!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: The storm has created patches of icy floor, be careful as to not slip into the falling icicles!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: [color=#a7a7a7]Ymir[/color] rests in a cave deep in the mountains to the North, collect the 3 keys to have the chance to challenge him!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Collect the keys, and I’ll help you prepare for the final battle!
